name: Edge of the World (Emre Jamie, Jan-Z, GrizzlyMagnumQQ, metonoid)
name_original: Edge of the World (Emre Jamie, Jan-Z, GrizzlyMagnumQQ, metonoid)
description:
This game (prototype) was developed for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 by Team BlueWizards.

Jam theme is: Let There Be Chaos

Subtext

The moon is about to hit the earth and we are trying to avoid various disasters and escape from the earth.

Team

Game Design
Emre "Jamie" KISIOGLU
Game Art
Emin Suha AKSU
Game Development
Can ALTAY
Onur BASCI
Composer
Atıf ALEMDAROGLU

Controls

W, A, S, D to Ride/Steer/Turn
Space to Brake
R to Restart Level
ESC to Pause Menu

Stock Assets

https://free3d.com/3d-model/19-low-poly-buildings-974347.html
https://free3d.com/3d-model/blender-lowpoly-nature-assets-pack-36502.html
https://free3d.com/3d-model/low-poly-bushes-799736.html
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/skybox-series-fr...

(All assets used in the production other than those mentioned above were designed by us during the GameJam period, and the SFX's were taken from Creative Commons-tagged videos on Youtube.)
